mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM Movie a Where 1=1

SELECT a.mSeq ,a.mNameKor ,a.mNameEn ,a.mAgeLimit ,a.mRunningTime ,a.mCountry ,a.mOpenDate ,a.mExplantion ,a.mRate ,a.src ,a.mGoldEgg FROM Movie a INNER JOIN searchStaff b ON b.Movie_mSeq = a.mSeq INNER JOIN staff c ON c.sfSeq = b.staff_sfSeq HAVING 1=1 AND mSeq = #{mSeq}
